name: Bro, where's My head???
description:
Dear Itch.io user
My name is Odin. I come from the land of darkness and I want to take over the world. 3 days ago I tried to resurrect the undeath. Unfortunately, something went wrong because the skeletons don't have heads, can you help Me find their heads? When I rule the world, I will leave You alone.

Features
Help Odin bring the heads back to the undead. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle.

- 60 levels
- Professional voice over ENG & PL
- You can help destroy the world
- Physics puzzle game
- Story
- Mouse, gamepad, keyboard
- Halloween theme & cartoon style
- 30 languages supported
- Linux/Windows/Mac
- All resolution supported

Get free Steam Key
https://itch.io/t/67604/how-to-get-a-steam-key-from-your-itchio-purchase
